text: Paola & Chiara is an Italian pop music duo consisting of Paola and Chiara Iezzi, two sisters who were born in Milan. They are the best selling female Italian group with over 6 million records sold. ==Related pages== *Paulina Rubio *Laura Pausini *Sarah Brightman *Kylie Minogue *Dannii Minogue *Moony *Eros Ramazzotti *Andrea Bocelli *Luciano Pavarotti Category:Italian musical groups
title: Paola & Chiara
